au.gov.ga.conn4d

Interface Habitat

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Habitat_Shapefile, Shapefile

    public interface Habitat
    A generic interface for spatial layers representing habitat features.
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setDataSource(java.lang.String polyFileName)
      Sets the location of the data source using a String representing the path of the source file(s).
      void setLookupField(java.lang.String polyKey)
      Sets the path String of the resource containing the polygon information
      void setNegLon(boolean negPolyCoord)
      Sets whether polygon coordinates have negative values.

      • setNegLon

        void setNegLon(boolean negPolyCoord)
        Sets whether polygon coordinates have negative values. Used to ensure that model output is back-transformed into the same coordinate system as the settlement polygons if necessary.
        Parameters:
        negPolyCoord -
